Articles.Content:
Hi.

Just throwing this out there:

How hard is it to implement a tool which allows you to select several parts in the VAB... and weld them together? In the flightscene, they would count as a single part. 

It might be very difficult. It might be easy. Which is it?

There is a mod called UbioZur Welding Ltd. that does exactly this. It's not updated yet.https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29?p=1669152&viewfull=1#post1669152

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29?p=1669152&viewfull=1#post1669152

> 
> There is a mod called UbioZur Welding Ltd. that does exactly this. It's not updated yet.https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29?p=1669152&viewfull=1#post1669152
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29?p=1669152&viewfull=1#post1669152](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29?p=1669152&viewfull=1#post1669152)
> https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29?p=1669152&viewfull=1#post1669152

Thank you very much.
